title: Build breaks since 1.15.11 when importing a file asynchronously in onMount (and using a monorepo?)
body:
### Describe the bug

~~Since the v1.15.11, the build breaks when importing a file asynchronously in `onMount` like so:~~

It appears to be linked to imports, in this case the `defineConfig` and `renderStudio` from Sanity

```svelte
<script lang="ts">
    import { onMount } from 'svelte'
    import { defineConfig, renderStudio } from 'sanity'

    let studioEl: HTMLDivElement

    onMount(async () => {
        const { default: config } = await import('sanity-studio/sanity.config')
        //                          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

        if (studioEl) {
            const sanityConfig = defineConfig({
                ...config,
                // Replace options with env variables
                projectId: import.meta.env.VITE_SANITY_ID,
                dataset: import.meta.env.VITE_SANITY_DATASET,
            })

            renderStudio(studioEl, sanityConfig)
        }
    })
</script>
```

Rolling back to 1.15.10 works as expected, it build fine. 1.16.00 also breaks builds.

### Reproduction

My project is quite big and using a monorepo so a repro would be complex but it is definitely linked to importing a file from another Monorepo package, or importing a file using `await import()`

https://github.com/flayks/sk-bug-1.15.11

### Logs

```Shell
[vite-plugin-sveltekit-compile] Could not find file ".svelte-kit/generated/client-optimized/nodes/4.js" in Vite manifest
âœ“ built in 17.38s
error during build:
Error: Could not find file ".svelte-kit/generated/client-optimized/nodes/4.js" in Vite manifest
    at resolve_symlinks (file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.15.11_svelte@3.58.0_vite@4.3.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/vite/build/utils.js:77:28)
    at find_deps (file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.15.11_svelte@3.58.0_vite@4.3.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/vite/build/utils.js:58:26)
    at file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.15.11_svelte@3.58.0_vite@4.3.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/vite/build/build_server.js:72:18
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at build_server_nodes (file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.15.11_svelte@3.58.0_vite@4.3.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/vite/build/build_server.js:33:22)
    at Object.handler (file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.15.11_svelte@3.58.0_vite@4.3.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/vite/index.js:737:5)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
    at async PluginDriver.hookParallel (file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/rollup@3.21.4/node_modules/rollup/dist/es/shared/node-entry.js:24459:17)
    at async file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/rollup@3.21.4/node_modules/rollup/dist/es/shared/node-entry.js:25820:13
    at async catchUnfinishedHookActions (file:///Users/flayks/sites/project/website/node_modules/.pnpm/rollup@3.21.4/node_modules/rollup/dist/es/shared/node-entry.js:24900:20)
```

### Severity

blocking an upgrade

### Additional Information

_No response_
